name: Pet of the Week – Luna
description: This week's pet of the week is a playful Siberian Husky named Luna (Tag #S404​). Luna loves to have a good conversation, enjoys playing in the water and is an explorer at heart. You’ll notice Luna came to us with a scar on her back. Our vet gave her a good bill of health, and she’s in need of a great home.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: This week’s pet of the week is a playful Siberian Husky named Luna (Tag #S404​). Luna loves to have a good conversation, enjoys playing in the water and is an explorer at heart. You’ll notice Luna came to us with a scar on her back. Our vet gave her a good bill of health, and she’s in need of a great home. If you are interested in adopting Luna, visit www.SDDAC.com.
